        private static int calculateInSampleSize(BitmapFactory.Options options,

                        int reqHeight)
        Calculates the InSampleSize.
        Parameters:
        options - BitmapFactory options
        reqWidth - The required height
        reqHeight - The required width
        Returns:
        Return the fitting InSampleSize for the given height and width.
